metadata.dc:author: Barreto-Filho, José Augusto
Correia, Luis Cláudio Lemos
Latado, Adriana L
metadata.dc:description: Metabolic syndrome has been proposed as a predictor of cardiovascular risk. However, such idea lacks strong scientific basis. This article reviews the evidence regarding that issue, challenging the existing paradigm of the prognostic value of metabolic syndrome.
metadata.dc:title: Metabolic or pseudometabolic syndrome?
